channel.title: Way to attack Monsters within a certain number of squares
channel.description: Like this: [code]attackPlayersWithin(76, misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10), 7500);[/code] But I want it to hit monsters instead.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 01:43:44 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Way to attack Monsters within a certain number of squares
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“tythus, post:2, topic:76137”]attacknpcsWithin(76, misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10), 7500);
try that :D[/quote]Okay lol… I was putting attackmonstersWithin[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 02:58:24 PM[/size][hr]Nope didn’t work.

Read full topic
